scripts.postinstall: npm run install-jekyll && npm run install-gems && bower update
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-scripts && npm run build-styles && npm run copy && npm run build-jekyll
scripts.build-jekyll: cd docs && bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml
scripts.build-scripts: uglifyjs src/js/yoi.js src/js/behaviours/*.js src/js/actions/*.js src/js/modules/*.js src/components/**/*.js --source-map-inline --beautify -o dist/js/yoi.js && npm run copy-scripts
scripts.build-styles: npm run styles-compile --source-map-map-inline && npm run styles-process && npm run copy-styles
scripts.styles-process: postcss -u autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions, not dead, > 1%, ie >= 11' dist/css/yoi.css -o dist/css/yoi.css --no-map
scripts.styles-compile: (cat src/less/yoi.less ; echo $(find src/components -name '*.less' -exec echo '@import "./{}";' \;)) | lessc - dist/css/yoi.css --include-path=./src/less
scripts.clean: npm run clean-dist && npm run clean-docs
scripts.clean-dist: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && mkdir dist/css dist/img dist/js
scripts.clean-docs: rm -rf docs/_site && mkdir docs/_site && rm -rf docs/assets && mkdir docs/assets && mkdir docs/assets/css docs/assets/img docs/assets/js
scripts.copy: npm run copy-favicon && npm run copy-images && npm run copy-scripts && npm run copy-styles
scripts.copy-images: cp src/img/* dist/img && cp dist/img/* docs/assets/img
scripts.publish: npm run clean && npm run publish-scripts && npm run publish-styles && npm run copy && npm run publish-jekyll
scripts.publish-jekyll: cd docs && JEKYLL_ENV=production bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml
scripts.publish-scripts: uglifyjs src/js/yoi.js src/js/behaviours/*.js src/js/actions/*.js src/js/modules/*.js src/components/**/*.js --compress -o dist/js/yoi.js && npm run copy-scripts
scripts.publish-styles: npm run styles-compile && npm run styles-process && npm run styles-compress && npm run copy-styles
scripts.watch-jekyll: chokidar 'docs/assets' 'docs/*.md' 'docs/_includes' 'docs/_layouts' 'docs/_pages' -c 'cd docs && npm run build-jekyll && browser-sync reload'
scripts.watch: npm run watch-styles & npm run watch-scripts & npm run watch-jekyll
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
